resources.string: Terms \n \t Please note that the information provided by the online COVID-19 assessment is offered only as helpful educational information and self-assessment of your symptoms. This self assessment does not replace professional evaluation or recommendations by your doctor and does not provide any treatment to any disease or symptoms including COVID-19. Any guidelines and suggestions provided is based on the accuracy of the information provided and the COVID-19 Task-force guidelines which are subject to change. If you are concerned about your immediate medical condition, seek professional medical attention and do not delay based on this educational information. By clicking continue you are accepting terms and conditions of this application.

Terms 
 	 Please note that the information provided by the online COVID-19 assessment is offered only as helpful educational information and self-assessment of your symptoms. This self assessment does not replace professional evaluation or recommendations by your doctor and does not provide any treatment to any disease or symptoms including COVID-19. Any guidelines and suggestions provided is based on the accuracy of the information provided and the COVID-19 Task-force guidelines which are subject to change. If you are concerned about your immediate medical condition, seek professional medical attention and do not delay based on this educational information. By clicking continue you are accepting terms and conditions of this application. 
 

PERSONAL INFORMATION WE COLLECT 
 	
When you visit the app as a registered user, we automatically collect certain information about your login, including information about your name and phone number. Additionally, as you take your COVID-19 self screening tests, we collect information about the COVID-19 symptoms you are having only if You choose to save the test result.
Additionally when you access your Camera through the application no information will be collected or saved. The camera is only accessed when you need to verify test certificate by scanning the QR code.
We use saved symptoms to do analytics of main COVID-19 symptoms that people are having for decision making. The analytics will have nothing to do with your details such as name and phone number 
 
 SHARING YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION 
 	
We do not share your personal information with anyone

 

YOUR RIGHTS 
 	 You have the right to access personal information we hold about you and to ask that your personal information be corrected, updated, or deleted. If you would like to exercise this right, please contact us through the contact information below.

 

DATA RETENTION 
 	 When you register on the app, we will maintain your registration Information for our records unless and until you ask us to delete this information.
Do you have chest pains or dry cough that recently started?
Sore throat or troubled swallowing that recently started?
Shortness of breath that started recently?
Do you feel very hot or cold?.Are you sweating of shivering for no reason?
Have you noticed any changes in your ability to test or smell things?
In the past days have you experienced body pains, especially your muscles hurting more than usual?

TERMS\n \t Nzwisiai kuti ruzivo rwamuchawana pano rwunongopiwa se ruzivo rwunokwanisa kukubatsira kuti uzvi tarise kana usina mukana wekuva ne COVID-19 uye kuti uone kana usina zviratidzo zve COVID-19. Kuzviongorora uchishandisa application ino hakubvise kukosha kweku tsvaka kunzwisisa uye rubatsiro kubva kunana mazvikokota vezveutano. Application ino haina kurapa kwainokuita pachirwere che COVID-19 or chero chimwe chirwere chaungava nacho. Matanho uye kurudziro yaungawane pane ino application ino enderana nekuti iwe wapa nhinduro dzechokwadi here uye zvimiso zve NICD izvo zvinokwanisa kushanduka nguva ne nguva. Pamusoro pehutano hwako kasika kutsvaga rubatsiro kune vezvehutano, usanonoka uchivimba ne application ino.
Oh Good Lord!Keeping your hands clean,washing them for at least 20 seconds at a time with water and soap is a great defense against Infection. Make it your habit
You sound like you are doing well - no need to test right now but repeat this test in 1 week or if anything changes!.

Good job!Keeping your hands clean,washing them for at least 20 seconds with water and soap is a great defense against infection. Keep it Up

It is not clear at the moment that the symptoms you have are COVID-19 symptoms, in the meantime please protect the ones you love by social distancing, wearing your mask always and Isolating for the next 4 days and repeat the test
